channel.title: CVE Feed for SearchBlox -- SearchBlox

item.title: CVE-2020-10128|2024-09-30T16:53:25.905Z -- searchblox -- searchblox
item.description: SearchBlox product with version before 9.2.1 is vulnerable to stored cross-site scripting at multiple user input parameters. In SearchBlox products multiple parameters are not sanitized/validate properly which allows an attacker to inject malicious JavaScript.
